Name: Carrier
About the game: What is Carrier? Carrier is a Free-to-Play timing-based puzzle game. It puts you in control of an operator who must modify and encrypt a transmission signal to avoid interception. Using simplistic two-button controls you'll guide the encrypted radio waves past the 'Scramblers' through 30 different levels spanning across 5 worlds. Features: - 5 Unique Worlds - 30 Challenging levels - Unique atmosphere and visual style - Relaxing music and sound effects - Simplistic two-button controls using either mouse or keyboard
